properties.entry: UPDATE SHOP SET SHOP_NM = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE SHOP SET SHOP_INTRODUCE = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_NM, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_INFO, ITEM_DATE, CATEGORY_CD, ITEM_STATUS_CD, MEMBER_NO, READ_COUNT, IMG_PATH, IMG_NM FROM ITEM LEFT JOIN ITEM_IMG USING(ITEM_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND ITEM_STATUS_CD = 0
SELECT POSTSCRIPT_NO, POSTSCRIPT_CHECK, SHOP_NO, MEMBER_NO, SHOP_NM FROM POSTSCRIPT JOIN SHOP USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE SHOP_NO = ? AND POSTSCRIPT_STATUS_CD = 0 ORDER BY 1
UPDATE POSTSCRIPT SET POSTSCRIPT_CHECK = ? WHERE POSTSCRIPT_NO = ?
UPDATE POSTSCRIPT SET POSTSCRIPT_STATUS_CD = 1 WHERE POSTSCRIPT_NO = ?

SELECT W.ITEM_NO, I.ITEM_NM, I.ITEM_PRICE, I.ITEM_DATE, E.IMG_PATH, IMG_NM FROM WISH W JOIN ITEM I ON(W.ITEM_NO = I.ITEM_NO) LEFT JOIN ITEM_IMG E ON(I.ITEM_NO = E.ITEM_NO) WHERE W.MEMBER_NO = ? AND W.WISH_STATUS_CD = 1
UPDATE WISH SET WISH_STATUS_CD = 2 WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND ITEM_NO = ?

SELECT P.SHOP_NO PURCHASER, I.MEMBER_NO SELLER, P.ITEM_NO, P.ITEM_STATUS_CD, I.ITEM_NM, I.ITEM_PRICE, I.ITEM_DATE, E.IMG_PATH, E.IMG_NM FROM PURCHASE P JOIN ITEM I ON(P.ITEM_NO = I.ITEM_NO) LEFT JOIN ITEM_IMG E ON(P.ITEM_NO = E.ITEM_NO) WHERE P.SHOP_NO = ? AND P.ITEM_STATUS_CD = 2
SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_NM, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_STATUS_CD, IMG_PATH, IMG_NM FROM ITEM LEFT JOIN ITEM_IMG USING(ITEM_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND ITEM_STATUS_CD = 1
UPDATE ITEM SET ITEM_STATUS_CD = 1 WHERE ITEM_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE ITEM SET ITEM_STATUS_CD = 0 WHERE ITEM_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
